Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Model

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable<Update>
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Model
public class Model
extends Observable<Update>
This class is a "proxy" between Controller and other components, such as the Match current state, and the RemoteView. It's used by the Controller: - to get information about the current game (model) state; - to update the game state according to the command received by Players; - to notify Updates to the connected Players.

This class is useful in particular to add a layer of abstraction and to decouple responsibilities between Model and Controller: in this way the component responsible to notify state changes to the View is always the Model component.

    • onPlayerLose

      public void onPlayerLose​(Player loserPlayer, LoseUpdate.LoseCause loseCause)
      Callback method called when a Player lost. If a Player lost, its Workers have to be removed from the game Board, and its reference has to be removed from the Match Players List.
      Parameters:
      loserPlayer - the Player who just lost
      loseCause - the reason why the Player lost

    • getPlayersNumber

      public int getPlayersNumber()
      Players Number getter
      Returns:
      the number of Players chosen for this match

    • gamePhaseUpdate

      public void gamePhaseUpdate​(GamePhase newGamePhase)
      Notifies the View (using RemoteView abstraction) that the current GamePhase has changed.
      Parameters:
      newGamePhase - the new current GamePhase for this match

    • reportError

      public void reportError​(Player player, CommandType commandType, ErrorType errorType, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> inhibitorGod)
      Notifies the View (using RemoteView abstraction) that there was an error executing a Command.
      Parameters:
      player - the Player who made the Command which caused the error
      commandType - the commandType corresponding to the attempted Command
      errorType - the specific ErrorType of the error raised
      inhibitorGod - [optional] the God that made the Command not executable

    • initialInfoUpdate

      public void initialInfoUpdate​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​PrintableColor> initialInfo)
      Notifies the View (using RemoteView abstraction) that some new Initial Info has been set for a Player.
      Parameters:
      initialInfo - the map which associates Players nicknames and Players colors.

    • godsUpdate

      public void godsUpdate​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> selectableGods, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> selectedGods)
      Notifies the View (using RemoteView abstraction) that a new God has been set for a Player.
      Parameters:
      selectableGods - the Gods that have been selected by the GodChooser, but have not been chosen by any Player.
      selectedGods - the map which associates Players nicknames and Players Gods.

      Notifies the View (using RemoteView abstraction) that a there was some changes in the Game Board (a Worker moved or built a new level)
      Parameters:
      executedCommand - the command which caused the changes to the Game Board

    • matchStartedUpdate

      public void matchStartedUpdate()

    • turnUpdate

      public void turnUpdate​(Player currentPlayer)
      Notifies the View (using RemoteView abstraction) that the current turn has changed.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - the new Player in turn now

    • winUpdate

      public void winUpdate​(Player winnerPlayer)
      Notifies the View (using RemoteView abstraction) that a Player won.
      Parameters:
      winnerPlayer - the Player who has won the Match

    • loseUpdate

      public void loseUpdate​(Player loserPlayer, LoseUpdate.LoseCause loseCause)
      Notifies the View (using RemoteView abstraction) that a Player lost.
      Parameters:
      loserPlayer - the Player who just lost
      loseCause - the reason why the Player lost

    • disconnectedPlayerUpdate

      public void disconnectedPlayerUpdate​(Player disconnectedPlayer)
      Notifies the View (using RemoteView abstraction) that a Player disconnected.
      Parameters:
      disconnectedPlayer - the Player who disconnected from the match
